languages.text: "Но Заря — она совсем другая. Она говорила со мной, как никто другой. Она открыла мне истину. И я открою ее тебе тоже... если ты хоть на минуту перестанешь сопротивляться! Что..." {n}Мужчина наконец-то понимает, что не один, и оборачивается к вам. В руках он сжимает длинный тонкий металлический стержень, с которого капает кровь.{/n} "У нас гости? С корабля фон Валанциус, надо думать. Эви, дорогой, придется тебе подождать. Не теряй сознания, прошу. Важно, чтобы ты все прочувствовал. Второй глаз тоже".

"But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

languages.text: “可‘极光’，她不一样，以前从来没有人像她这样这么对我说话。她让我看到了真相，现在，我也同样可以让你看到真相……只要你别再挣扎，只要一分钟就好！等等，怎么回事……”{n}这个男人终于意识到这里还有别人。他朝你转过了身，手里拿着一根细长的金属棒，上面还滴着血。{/n}“有客人来了？我敢打赌，你们是从冯·瓦兰修斯的船上来的。我亲爱的小艾，你恐怕得等等了。我求求你，千万别晕过去。你将会感受到一切，包括你的另一只眼睛，这很重要。”
languages.original_text: "But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

traits.locale_text: “可‘极光’，她不一样，以前从来没有人像她这样这么对我说话。她让我看到了真相，现在，我也同样可以让你看到真相……只要你别再挣扎，只要一分钟就好！等等，怎么回事……”{n}这个男人终于意识到这里还有别人。他朝你转过了身，手里拿着一根细长的金属棒，上面还滴着血。{/n}“有客人来了？我敢打赌，你们是从冯·瓦兰修斯的船上来的。我亲爱的小艾，你恐怕得等等了。我求求你，千万别晕过去。你将会感受到一切，包括你的另一只眼睛，这很重要。”

languages.text: 「しかし、オーロラは…彼女は違うのだ。こんな話ができる相手は、彼女が初めてだった。彼女は私に真実を明かした。そして今から、私はお前にそれを明かす…お前が抗うのをやめればね！おや…」{n}男はようやく自分が一人ではないことに気づき、あなたの方を向いた。彼は血が滴る細長い金属棒を握りしめている。{/n}「客人がいるとはな。フォン・ヴァランシウスの船から来たのか。エヴィーよ、待っていてくれ。気を失わないでいてくれよ。お前がすべてを感じることが重要なのだ。そのもう片方の目を含めて、ね」
languages.original_text: "But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、オーロラは…彼女は違うのだ。彼女は、かつて誰も経験したことのないような方法で、私と話をした。彼女は私に真実を明らかにした。そして今、私はお前にそれを明らかにすることができる…お前が1分間だけ、抗うのをやめれば！おや…」{n}男はようやく自分が一人ではないことに気づき、あなたの方を向いた。彼は血が滴る細長い金属棒を握りしめている。{/n}「客人がいるとは。フォン・ヴァランシウスの船から来たのかね。エヴィー、愛する者よ、待っていてくれ。気を失わないでいてくれよ。すべてを感じることが重要なのだ。お前のもう片方の目を含めて」

「しかし、オーロラは…彼女は違うのだ。こんな話ができる相手は、彼女が初めてだった。彼女は私に真実を明かした。そして今から、私はお前にそれを明かす…お前が抗うのをやめればね！おや…」{n}男はようやく自分が一人ではないことに気づき、あなたの方を向いた。彼は血が滴る細長い金属棒を握りしめている。{/n}「客人がいるとはな。フォン・ヴァランシウスの船から来たのか。エヴィーよ、待っていてくれ。気を失わないでいてくれよ。お前がすべてを感じることが重要なのだ。そのもう片方の目を含めて、ね」

languages.text: "Aber Aurora ... sie ist anders. Sie hat mit mir gesprochen wie noch nie jemand zuvor. Sie hat mir die Wahrheit offenbart. Und jetzt kann ich sie Euch offenbaren ... wenn Ihr nur mal eine Minute stillhaltet! Was ...?" {n}Erst jetzt erkennt der Mann, dass er nicht alleine ist, und dreht sich zu dir um. Er umklammert einen dünnen Metallstab, von dem Blut tropft.{/n} "Wir haben Gäste? Von dem Schiff derer von Valancius, möchte ich wetten. Evvie, mein Lieber, jetzt müsst Ihr warten. Bleibt bei Bewusstsein, ich flehe Euch an. Es ist wichtig, dass Ihr alles spürt. Einschließlich Eures anderen Auges."
languages.original_text: "But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

traits.locale_text: "Aber Aurora ... sie ist anders. Sie hat mit mir gesprochen wie noch nie jemand zuvor. Sie hat mir die Wahrheit offenbart. Und jetzt kann ich sie Euch offenbaren ... wenn Ihr nur mal eine Minute stillhaltet! Was ...?" {n}Erst jetzt erkennt der Mann, dass er nicht alleine ist, und dreht sich zu dir um. Er umklammert einen dünnen Metallstab, von dem Blut tropft.{/n} "Wir haben Gäste? Von dem Schiff derer von Valancius, möchte ich wetten. Evvie, mein Lieber, jetzt müsst Ihr warten. Bleibt bei Bewusstsein, ich flehe Euch an. Es ist wichtig, dass Ihr alles spürt. Einschließlich Eures anderen Auges."

languages.text: « Mais Aurore... est différente. Elle m'a parlé comme personne ne l'avait jamais fait auparavant. Elle m'a dévoilé la vérité. Et je peux te la révéler à ton tour... si tu arrêtes de gigoter une minute ! Que... » {n}L'homme finit par réaliser qu'il n'est pas seul et se tourne vers vous. Il tient une longue tige métallique maculée de sang.{/n} « Des invités ? Du vaisseau von Valancius, je parie. Evvie, très cher, tu vas devoir attendre. Ne t'évanouis pas, je t'en supplie. Tu dois tout ressentir, c'est important. Même ton autre œil. »
languages.original_text: "But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

traits.locale_text: « Mais Aurore... est différente. Elle m'a parlé comme personne ne l'avait jamais fait auparavant. Elle m'a dévoilé la vérité. Et je peux te la révéler à ton tour... si tu arrêtes de gigoter une minute ! Que... » {n}L'homme finit par réaliser qu'il n'est pas seul et se tourne vers vous. Il tient une longue tige métallique maculée de sang.{/n} « Des invités ? Du vaisseau von Valancius, je parie. Evvie, très cher, tu vas devoir attendre. Ne t'évanouis pas, je t'en supplie. Tu dois tout ressentir, c'est important. Même ton autre œil. »

languages.text: «Pero Aurora... es diferente. Habló conmigo como nadie antes lo había hecho. Me reveló la verdad. Y ahora puedo revelártela a ti... ¡si dejas de resistirte por un momento! ¿Qué...?». {n}El hombre por fin se da cuenta de que no está solo y se gira hacia ti. Porta una vara metálica larga y delgada de la que gotea sangre.{/n} «¿Tenemos invitados? De la nave von Valancius, apuesto. Evvie, amigo mío, tendrás que esperar. No pierdas el conocimiento, te lo ruego. Es importante que lo sientas todo. Incluso tu otro ojo».
languages.original_text: "But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

traits.locale_text: «Pero Aurora... es diferente. Habló conmigo como nadie antes lo había hecho. Me reveló la verdad. Y ahora puedo revelártela a ti... ¡si dejas de resistirte por un momento! ¿Qué...?». {n}El hombre por fin se da cuenta de que no está solo y se gira hacia ti. Porta una vara metálica larga y delgada de la que gotea sangre.{/n} «¿Tenemos invitados? De la nave von Valancius, apuesto. Evvie, amigo mío, tendrás que esperar. No pierdas el conocimiento, te lo ruego. Es importante que lo sientas todo. Incluso tu otro ojo».

languages.text: "Aurora öyle mi? O farklı. Benimle daha önce hiç kimsenin konuşmadığı gibi konuştu. Bana hakikati açıkladı. Şimdi ben de sana açıklayacağım... Bir dakika kıvranmayı kes! Ne..." {n}Adam, sonunda yalnız olmadığını anlıyor ve sana dönüyor. Elinde, üzerinden kan damlayan, uzun, ince bir metal çubuk tutuyor.{/n} "Misafirlerimiz mi var? Kesin von Valancius'un gemisinden gelmişlerdir. Evvie, canım, biraz bekleteceğim. Rica ederim bayılma. Diğer gözün de dâhil her şeyi hissetmen çok önemli."
languages.original_text: "But Aurora — she is different. She spoke with me like no one ever had before. She revealed the truth to me. And now I can reveal it to you... if you just stop struggling for one minute! What..." {n}The man finally realises he is not alone and turns to you. He is clutching a long thin metallic rod with blood dripping off it.{/n} "We have guests? From the von Valancius ship, I would wager. Evvie, my dear, you will have to wait. Do not faint, I beg of you. It's important that you feel everything. Including your other eye."

Ne..." {n}Adam, sonunda yalnız olmadığını anlıyor ve sana dönüyor. Elinde, üzerinden kan damlayan, uzun, ince bir metal çubuk tutuyor.{/n} "Misafirlerimiz mi var?
